thread.title: Chrishae Rowe dismissed from UK Hoops team
thread.title_full: Chrishae Rowe dismissed from UK Hoops team

title: Chrishae Rowe dismissed from UK Hoops team
text:
Chrishae Rowe dismissed from UK Hoops team Updated: Thu 10:17 PM, Oct 15, 2015 / Headlines List / Article 
LEXINGTON, Ky. (WKYT) Chrishae Rowe has been dismissed from the Kentucky women’s basketball team for failure to uphold the standards of the program, head coach Matthew Mitchell announced Thursday. 
“We wish Chrishae well in her future endeavors and we hope she can find success in her life,” Mitchell said. 
The 5-foot-10 Rowe transferred to Kentucky from Oregon in January and would have been eligible to play for the Wildcats after the fall semester. She was the Pac-12’s Freshman of the Year and earned all-conference honors after averaging 21.6 points per game for the Ducks. Her 690 points set a school freshman record and were just three shy of Alison Lang’s season mark.
